import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; export default function Repetitions({exercise_id}) { const [repetitions, setRepetitions] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch(`/repetitions/${exercise_id}`) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((repetitions) => setRepetitions(repetitions)); }, [exercise.id]); return (


{exercises.map((exercise) => (

{exercise.name}

Repetitions Weights
Reps Stuff
))}
Add Exercise


); }
